content: i like to leave some unstuffed part so they fall more loosely from the body tail do not stuff start with black yarn row 1 sc6 in magic_ring row 2 sc1 increase around 9sts row 3 sc2 increase around 12 row 4 sc12 row 5 back loops only sc12 change color to brown row 6 back loops only sc12 row 7 sc12 you can tie the black and brown yarn ends make a knot and just leave inside the tail continue sc12 in every row until the tail is as long as you wish it to be make around 20 25 strands of yarn 10cm long approx and attach them to the front loops of row 5 and 6 *for the brushy part of the tail please see the instruction picture on the baby cow now just sew everything together as on the picture stuff the nose when there is only small hole left when you sew weave in the ends cut remaining tails and enjoy your new plushie  mommy cow materials used crochet hook size 3 5mm yarn used himalaya everyday colors black and white 100g/250m himalaya everyday bebe lux crème color number 70437 100g/250m himalaya everyday bebe lux color light brown the one horns are crocheted color number 70414 100g/250m if you use other kind of yarn and hook size you ll just get different size of the toy my finished work is around 15-16cm tall black thread for nose eyelashes eyebrows if you want to make them safety eyes or buttons some toy or pillow stuffing *work in continuous rounds the sewing is same as with baby cow so i m not posting the same pictures just the pattern the finished cow is around 30cm tall pattern head stuff when you start decreasing eyes are going around the middle of the head -
